title: Problem Title Here
description: Brief description of what the problem asks you to do.

approach.title: Your Solution Approach Name
approach.description: Explain the main approach/algorithm used to solve this problem.

content.problemStatement: Full problem statement with code formatting and bold text where needed. Use HTML tags for formatting. You can add multiple paragraphs and lists as needed.

examples.title: Example 1:
examples.explanation: Explain why this input produces this output.

keyInsights: Key insight 1: Explain an important concept or technique used.
Key insight 2: Another important observation or pattern.
Key insight 3: Additional insights that help understand the solution.

python.explanation: Explain how the Python solution works step by step.

java.explanation: Explain how the Java solution works step by step.

cpp.explanation: Explain how the C++ solution works step by step.
